Portfolio

Today's market needs software driven businesses to respond for change & disruption by redefining the way they design, build & use software. We can accelerate your IT strategy to differentiate & succeed.

    • DataOps

    • DevOps

    • Data Science

    • UX/UI

    • Mobility

API platform

API economy is driving the next wave of change in the application ecosystem by giving companies the ability to rapidly iterate business processes & user experiences by encapsulating & sharing information effectively in a solution stack. SOA/APIs/Web services have elevated from a development technique to a strategic asset that can be reused, shared & monetized. Platforms are the new business model driver for companies by leading the way for new revenue streams & creating business value.

Help others identify monetization opportunities.
Billee Howard
Entrepreneur
Netflix receives nearly two-billion requests each day resulting in roughly 20 billion internal API calls.
Wikipedia

Microservices Architecture

MSA is an emerging architectural pattern for building distributed applications that support Bimodal architecture with different capability views. One that responds quickly to business needs & the other providing stable, secure & predictable IT service. Business success requires strong capability to achieve Shorter time-to-market, seamless omni-channel experience, gaining consumer insights & automated service delivery. MSA delivers the capacity to build an application ecosystem capable of being agile, flexible and scalable.

Data Integration

Data driven approach help businesses to gain greater transparency in the operations, enable better predictions and achieve delivery productivity & profit gains. Data sourcing is a key capability for organizations to run business functions & to build analytics models for predicting & optimizing outcomes. Data integration techniques identify, combine and manage multiple source of data. Sourcing relevant data from the system of record of different business functions & model building them will help companies to get a clear view of their business environment.

It is a capital mistake to theorize before one has data.
Torture the data and it will confess to anything
Those who do not remember the past are condemned to repeat it
Arthur Conan Doyle
Sherlock Holmes
Ronald Coase
Nobel Prize Laureate
George Santayana
Philosopher
Consumer data will be the biggest differentiator in the next two to three years. Whoever unlocks the reams of data and uses it strategically will win.
Angela Ahrendts
CEO of Burberry

Data Virtualization

With the proliferation of Data Explosion, disparate data silos, greater automation there is a need for a data service layer to support information agility. The IT teams should be able to access data in real-time or near-real time from asymmetric data sources, on premise or cloud for business transactions, analytics & other payloads as a self-service data platform. Information agility is a catalyst for growth, innovation and efficiency for organizations. DV leverages modern computing capabilities with traditional data integration techniques to deliver self-service access to real-time data at a lower cost with more speed & agility.

CI/CD Orchestration

With Agile getting into the mainstream of software development, small-batch transfers, quick feedback loops, limited WIP, cost-of-delay and ability to address high variability of requirements, MTTR (Mean Time To Recovery) & MTBF (Mean Time Between Failures) has become the new paradigm to achieve software-efficiency. Continuous integration, continuous validation, continuous delivery and publishing workable-state of software at any given instant are the underlying delivery principles of every agile team today. CI/CD has brought transparency & velocity in today's software delivery process.

The long-term value of an enterprise is not captured by the value of its products and intellectual property but rather by its ability to continuously increase the value it provides to customers — and to create new customers — through innovation.
Jez Humble
Author of Continuous Delivery
80% of enterprise say a slowdown to a mission-critical application would have a moderate to extreme effect on overall business performance.
Riverbed

Performance Engineering

With the proliferation of the digital business, high availability & consistently high performing IT-application eco-system represent how your customers experience your products and services. Traditional approach to performance management has changed significantly in the recent years due to increased complexity of IT-environment, new paradigms like data analytics, end-user monitoring, complex operations event processing and so on. Key differentiator to business success today is consistent good application performance. A integrated framework to manage performance across the application lifecycle with good DevOps practices can give a competitive advantage for your business.

Test Automation

With the resurgence of agile practice, test automation has gained significant adoption across the application lifecycle. Automation is seen as an invincible need for the success of DevOps today. Testing as a practice have been evolving by the side of Agile & XP practices over years. There are many new frameworks and development methods for delivering quality software today. TDD/BDD approach has pushed the limits of software testing to be more granular and context driven. Agile teams use Test automation as a potent tool for delivering velocity in the software release cycles.

Being able to take needless work out of the system is more important than being able to put more work into the system.
Gene Kim
The Phoenix Project
Quality means doing it right when no one is looking.
Henry Ford
Industrialist, Founder of Ford Motors

Agile Testing - SDET

Agile development model has shifted the testing landscape to a greater magnitude. Legacy testing practice is of little or no relevance in the agile movement.The modern-day definition of a tester has changed. A SDET is a System-thinker, Developer & Efficient Tester. The responsibility of a tester is not limited to functional compliance. The modern day tester has to ensure increased code quality, reduce integration risk, should be eliminating redundancies, automate the entire development pipeline & capable of making the code work. Testers should light the path by unfolding the unknowns in the IT-applications ecosystem. They differentiate & bring value in the software delivery process.

Operational Analytics

Software driven businesses are run by myriad of technology stacks hosted on disparate IT environments. Detecting the anomalies in a convoluted IT environment fuels more complexity, delays and down-time. This trend will inevitably get worse if companies tackle this problem with mere human intelligence. To counter this downward spiral, to improve the IT-operational excellence & to keep the uptime of day-to-day business operations, companies need intelligent service monitoring & management capabilities. Applying big-data analytics inward for operational systems will enable predictability & stability for companies to run complex business operations.

With rising complexity, you need to make sense of data – operational analytics is the key.
The operational data explosion has sparked a sudden and significant increase in demand for ITOA systems.
John Rakowski
Analyst & Advisor, Forrester
Will Cappelli
Research VP, Gartner
Without big data and analytics, companies are blind and deaf, wandering out onto the web like deer on a freeway.
Data is a precious thing and will last longer than the systems themselves.
We know the what, but we don’t know the why. When applying PA, we usually don’t know about causation, and we often don’t necessarily care. For many PA projects, the objective is more to predict than it is to understand the world and figure out what makes it tick.
Geoffrey Moore
Author and Consultant
Tim Berners-Lee
Inventor of WWW
Eric Siegel
Predictive Analytics

Predictive Analytics

Big-data has unlocked spectrum of opportunity for companies to re-imagine how they do their business. Predictive analytics uses techniques like data mining, data modeling, data management, statistical algorithms, machine learning & artificial intelligence to analyze patterns and the likely-hood of future outcomes, risks and opportunities for businesses. This practice enables organizations to identify the trends, understand customer behavior, improve business performance, help drive strategic decision making and create competitive advantage.

Data Visualization

Driving human perception, cognition and communicating information in the form of visualization to drive insights and actionable intelligence is the emerging trend to understand multi-dimensional data. DV is a powerful way to represent real-time, contextual & situational data for operational, tactical & strategic business needs. Algorithmic view of historical data Vs real-time data transactions using big-data analytics & Data visualization gives organizations the ability to detect pattern anomalies, data correlation, gather metrics & help them to see and understand data.

The greatest value of a picture is when it forces us to notice what we never expected to see.
Visualizations act as a campfire around which we gather to tell stories.
John Tukey
Mathematician
Al Shalloway
CEO, Net Objectives

Enterprise Mobility

Mobile first is at the center of IT strategy for every business. Enterprise mobility management (EMM) suites has helped organizations to push their IT products & services as an extensible & on-demand commodity. EMM gives the ability for enterprise organization to provision, audit, track, identify & configure devices and applications services for remote use and also defend & secure the enterprise data from the untrusted devices or users. API proliferation has made the enterprise data usage extensible to the remote devices via enterprise app stores with proper policy governance enabling a seamless integration to the enterprise backend services for business transactions.

We are no longer in a mobile first world; we are in a mobile only world.
Larry Page
Alphabet CEO
You will never walk into a room full of adults on the same device. So why would we force them to use the same device? Emulate the real world.
Todd Nesloney
Teacher, Speaker

BYOD

Number of digital devices and platforms available for consumers today has exploded in recent years. Today's digital population is more connected than ever, with more access to content & connected lifestyles, there is a rapid adoption of second screen as a standard practice in our daily lives. The way people work & communicate has changed significantly, enterprises are also adopting to the new paradigm by enabling employees to connect to work through their own devices. Organizations are addressing enterprise security for BYOD through Policy governance, Education of Employees on firm use of policies & guidelines, It is no longer about securing devices & network, the new cultural shift organizations are moving towards is to secure the data and the app.

Mobility Testing

Mobile applications are becoming frontline for organizations to communicate and transact with their customers & employees. Devices & platforms explosion with spectrum of communication networks pose huge challenges for the application development & delivery organizations to deliver reliable & high-quality customer experience. Our strong platform agnostic automation expertise and enterprise background can help companies to succeed in their mobility journey.

The reality is that the threats targeting mobile devices have not changed. There are still two main causes of data loss on mobile devices: physical device loss and misuse of apps.
Dionisio Zumerle
Research Director at Gartner
Mobility is not about smartphones, but rather the ability to move across devices with different operating systems.
Consumerization will be the most significant trend affecting IT during the next 10 years.
James Cooper
Chief Technologist, HPE
Gartner

Consumer Apps

The physical and virtual environments are thickly integrated into our daily lives with the technology ubiquity. Consumerization & omni channel experience has radicalized the way consumers buy products and services. The API & sharing economy has proliferated the way businesses go beyond their boundaries to find new customers & offer on-demand services. We offer customer-centric mobile strategy for companies to differentiate and succeed.

Interaction Design

Interaction design principles underpin the behavior & utility aspects of customer-centric product development process. To gain context to design decisions, our product-design approach starts with a customer dialogue followed by discussions to study workflow, user interactions, user orientation, understanding decision points & mapping the feedback loops. We value humility, learning, listening & curiosity as fundamental guiding principles for a good designer. The design-thinking is a cultural challenge every organization should start adopting to remain valuable to their customers.

Visual Design

A product with a strong business purpose with rich user experience have the potential for increased user adoption. User experience come out of usability, performance & aesthetics. Visual design is a design process that touches the emotional aspects of human-interactions in communicating a product. VD enhance the interaction design with images, colors, fonts & other components creating an emotional connect with the users. Interactive design delivers the functional need of a product visually; Visual design draw the user attention to that functionality & prioritize the user interaction thereby amplifying the business value & brand loyalty to the customers.

Frontend Development

A good User Experience comes to life with rich client components. Frontend-frameworks are evolving into an intelligent platform by rendering fluid, responsive, faster & fully extensible applications. Customer needs for a good design experience are different, and one size doesn't fit all. Our front-end wizards specialize in multiple front-end platforms, Web-template engines, and JavaScript template libraries for data binding to deliver a seamless & faster user experience.

Reporting Dashboard

Reports & Dashboards are the visual facade & frontline of IT systems to showcase the business intelligence of an organization. It is also a best tool to gain insights into business operations and performance. Dashboards/Reporting enable teams to set goals, define metrics and benchmark the KPIs attributing to success of the organization. Operational & Analytics dashboard have taken the business intelligence of an organizations to a different level. Trends, patterns, analysis, insights & recommendations through data analytics & dashboards are the key drivers for the organization to differentiate and succeed.

How We Work

Learn

Learn unique business problems by tapping the knowledge of the business climate & technology

Research

Every customer engagement will undergo the process of learning their business & market trends with bench marking

Consult

Our specialists & technologists will reaffirm your business needs with their industry experience in designing an optimal IT solution

Build

The development & test cycles will be short and rapid. Validate our deliverable in a continuous pipeline. We can quickly integrate your custom, legacy or enterprise class solutions

Deliver

Our test driven development model on Agile will ensure on-time delivery of your projects with world class performance & stability. Our solutions are highly scalable & portable
